mwunit-description: A short description of the extension as it will appear on Special:Version
mwunit-outside-test-namespace: Inline error message shown when a <testcase> tag is used outside of NS_TEST
mwunit-invalid-dbms: Exception message shown when the wiki is using a database management system that MWUnit does not support
mwunit-run-tests-button: Button label shown on the 'Run tests' button on the MWUnit special page
mwunit-run-test-button: Button label shown on the 'Run test' button on the MWUnit special page
mwunit-group-test-legend: Form legend for running groups form on the MWUnit special page
mwunit-individual-test-legend: Form legend for the run individual test form on the MWUnit special page
mwunit-special-individual-label: Form label for the run individual test form on the MWUnit special page
mwunit-test-result-summary: Short summary showing some statistics on the summary special page
mwunit-test-result-summary-profiling-inf: Short summary showing profiling statistics on the summary special page
mwunit-test-success: The word 'Passed' followed by a colon
mwunit-test-risky: The word 'Risky' followed by a colon
mwunit-test-failed: The word 'Failed' followed by a colon
mwunit-strict-coverage-violation: Test risky message shown when a tests violates $wgMWUnitStrictCoverage
mwunit-assert-failure-expression: Test failure message for the 'expression' assertion
mwunit-assert-failure-equal: Test failure message for the 'equal' assertion
mwunit-assert-failure-contains-string: Test failure message for the 'contains_string' assertion
mwunit-assert-failure-string-starts-with: Test failure message for the 'string_starts_with' assertion
mwunit-assert-failure-string-ends-with: Test failure message for the 'string_ends_with' assertion
mwunit-assert-failure-error: Test failure message for the 'error' assertion
mwunit-assert-failure-greater-than: Test failure message for the 'greater_than' assertion
mwunit-assert-failure-greater-than-or-eq: Test failure message for the 'greater_than_or_equal' assertion
mwunit-assert-failure-has-length: Test failure message for the 'has_length' assertion
mwunit-assert-failure-is-integer: Test failure message for the 'is_integer' assertion
mwunit-assert-failure-is-numeric: Test failure message for the 'is_numeric' assertion
mwunit-assert-failure-empty: Test failure message for the 'empty' assertion
mwunit-assert-failure-that: Test failure message for the 'that' assertion
mwunit-assert-failure-not-empty: Test failure message for the 'not_empty' assertion
mwunit-assert-failure-less-than: Test failure message for the 'less_than' assertion
mwunit-assert-failure-less-than-or-equal: Test failure message for the 'less_than_or_equal' assertion
mwunit-assert-failure-no-error: Test failure message for the 'no_error' assertion
mwunit-assert-failure-page-exists: Test failure message for the 'page_exists' assertion
mwunit-assert-failure-has-property: Test failure message for the 'has_property' assertion
mwunit-assert-failure-property-has-value: Test failure message for the 'property_has_value' assertion
mwunit-invalid-user: Test skipped message shown when the user in the '@user' annotation does not exist
mwunit-sidebar-item: The header used in the sidebar
mwunit-sidebar-run-tests: The sidebar 'Run tests' link located on pages in the NS_TEST namespace
mwunit-sidebar-run-tests-for-template: The sidebar 'Run associated unit tests' link located on templates that have tests covering it
mwunit-no-assertions: Test risky message shown when a test contains zero assertions
mwunit-invalid-context: Test skipped message shown when a test has an invalid context annotation
mwunit-invalid-assertion: Test risky message shown when a test has one or more assertions with an invalid amount of parameters
mwunit-invalid-covers-annotation: Test skipped message shown when a test has an invalid '@covers' annotation
mwunit-mocked-cover-template: Test risky message shown when the covers annotation of a test is a mocked template
mwunit-missing-permissions-mock-user: Test risky message shown when the test is required to be ran as another user, but running a test as another user is disabled or disallowed
mwunit-config-max-test-execution-time: Configuration parameter description for the configuration parameter defining the max execution time of a group of tests
mwunit-create-parser-mock-reserved-funct: Inline error message shown to the user if they try to mock a reserved parser function
mwunit-create-parser-mock-nonexistent-fu: Inline error message shown to the user if they try to mock a non-existent parser function
mwunit-config-default-testdox: Configuration parameter description for the configuration parameter defining whether or not to use TestDox as the default ResultPrinter when using the command-line test runner
mwunit-config-backup-globals: Configuration parameter description for the configuration parameter defining whether or not to backup globals and superglobals for each test case
mwunit-config-strict-coverage: Configuration parameter description for the configuration parameter defining whether or not to to be strict about untruthful covers annotations
mwunit-config-force-covers-annotation: Configuration parameter description for the configuration parameter defining whether or not to force the @covers annotation
mwunit-config-allow-running-test-as-othe: Configuration parameter description for the configuration parameter defining whether or not to allow people with the 'mwunit-mock-user' right to mock other users during testing
mwunit-config-allow-transclusion: Configuration parameter description for the configuration parameter defining whether or not to show profiling information ont he MWUnit special page
mwunit-config-max-test-cases: Configuration parameter description for the configuration parameter defining the maximum number of test cases allowed on a single test page
mwunit-config-max-reported-errors: Configuration parameter description for the configuration parameter defining the maximum number of errors reported on a single test page
mwunit-config-show-profiling-info: Configuration parameter description for the configuration parameter defining whether or not to show profiling information
mwunit-special-title: Header for the MWUnit special page
mwunit-generic-error-description: Generic error message shown when something unknown goes wrong
mwunit-special-result-title: Header for the MWUnit special page when showing test results
mwunit-special-group-label: Form label used for the group form
mwunit-create-mock-missing-argument: Inline error message shown when the 'create_mock' parser function is missing an argument
mwunit-create-parser-mock-missing-argume: Inline error message shown when the 'create_parser_mock' parser function is missing an argument
mwunit-create-mock-bad-title: Inline error message shown when the user tries to mock a page that does not exist
specialpages-group-mwunit: Name of the special page group as shown on Special:SpecialPages
mwunit-exception-header: Message used as the header for the special page when an exception occurred
mwunit-unhandled-exception-intro: Introductory message shown on the special page when an exception occurred
mwunit-unhandled-exception-debug-intro: Message shown above the stack trace on the special page when an exception occurred
mwunit-test-transclusion-error: Inline error message shown to the user if they try to transclude a test page
mwunit-cannot-move: Error message shown on the MovePage special page when the user tries to do an invalid move
mwunit-exception-function-hook: Exception message for the exception thrown when the extension tries to restore a function hook that does not exist
mwunit-exception-invalid-test-name: Exception message for the exception thrown when an invalid test name is used
mwunit-exception-invalid-mock: Exception message for the exception thrown when the extension tries to restore a mock that does not exist
mwunit-setup-method-hover: Tooltip shown when the user hovers over the 'setup' method, The word 'setUp' should not be translated
mwunit-teardown-method-hover: Tooltip shown when the user hovers over the 'teardown' method, The word 'tearDown' should not be translated
mwunit-testpage-intro: Short message shown at the start of a test page
mwunit-no-results: Message shown when no results were found
mwunit-error-intro: Short message shown at the start of an invalid test page
mwunit-duplicate-setup: Error message shown then more than one 'setup' method exists, The word 'setUp' should not be translated
mwunit-duplicate-teardown: Error message shown then more than one 'teardown' method exists, The word 'tearDown' should not be translated
mwunit-missing-annotation: Error message shown when a test case is missing a required annotation
mwunit-duplicate-entry: Error message shown when more than one test case exists with the same name
mwunit-missing-covers: Error message shown when the test case is missing the required 'covers' annotation
mwunit-max-test-cases-exceeded: Error message shown when the number of tests on a test page exceeded the defined maximum number of test cases on a test page
mwunit-invalid-db-article-id: Exception message for the exception thrown when an invalid article ID exists in the database
mwunit-missing-db-content: Exception message for the exception thrown when the 'content' in the database is missing
mwunit-too-many-errors: Error message shown when there are too many errors on a single test page
mwunit-test-skipped: The word 'Skipped' followed by a colon
mwunit-skipped: Error message shown when the user annotated a test with '@skip'; the word 'skip' should not be translated
mwunit-skipped-missing-extensions: Error message shown when the user annotated a test with '@requires' and one or more extension in the 'requires' was missing, The variable is a comma separated list of missing extensions
mwunit-invalid-expression: Test risky message shown when an expression in the 'assert_expression' parser function was invalid
mwunit-skipped-missing-extensions-plural: Test skipped message (plural) shown when more than one extension from the test cases '@requires' attribute is missing
mwunit-skipped-missing-extensions-singul: Test skipped message (singular) shown when exactly one extension from the test cases '@requires' attribute is missing
apihelp-rununittests-summary: Summary shown on the 'rununittests' API page
apihelp-query+unittests-summary: Summary shown on the 'query+unittests' API page
action-mwunit-runtests: The plural action right given by 'mwunit-runtests'
action-mwunit-mock-user: The plural action right given by 'mwunit-mock-user'
action-mwunit-createtests: The plural action right given by 'mwunit-createtests'
